titleStmt.title: By the Lord Generall. Whereas it hath pleased the Queenes Maiestie for necessary defence of her Highnesse realme against forreine inuitation, to cause sundry troupes of horse and footemen to be leuied out of diuers adioyning counties, ..., We Charles Earle of Notingham, Baron Haward of Effingham, ... doe by this our proclamation straightly charge and commaund ...
Proclamations. 1599-08-22
titleStmt.author: Nottingham, Charles Howard, Earl of, ca. 1536-1624.
England and Wales. Sovereign (1558-1603 : Elizabeth I)

publicationStmt.publisher: By the deputies of Christopher Barker, printer to the Queenes most excellent Maiestie,

notesStmt.note: Fixing prices of provisions for troops near London--STC.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
